thread.title: Margaret Cho planned to curse out President Trump at Grammys
thread.title_full: Margaret Cho planned to curse out President Trump at Grammys - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Margaret Cho planned to curse out President Trump at Grammys
text:
Margaret Cho lost out on her Grammy Sunday night, but she gave her simple acceptance speech.
“F--k Donald Trump,” the comedian said backstage after losing Best Comedy Album to Patton Oswalt for “Talking For Clapping.”
Cho, who was nominated for “American Myth,” hosted a pre-show and handed out 75 awards before the main event.
Debuting new curly hair, the actress also warned losers to keep quiet — referencing Kanye West’s famous “I’mma let you finish” interruption at the 2009 MTV VMAs.
Grammys 2017 winners and losers 
18 photos view gallery Grammys 2017: Best and worst red carpet looks “Kanye's not here, so that will be fine,” she joked.
With News Wire Services 
Tags: grammys
